WriteTab.WriteTextboxPlacehold: Enter a topic of your article to write.
WriteTab.LoadingMsg: Polaris Office AI will write a composition with the article you wrote!
WriteTab.ToSameTopic: I will work on it again with the same topic!

ChatingTab.AIGreeting: Hello, I am Polaris AI Chat. I'm here to help you create a document easy and fast.
ChatingTab.UseVariableForm: Create your response in various formats.
ChatingTab.InfoChat: Start a new chat! What topic would you like to talk about?

TipList.1ChatingCredit: credit(s) will be deducted per conversation.
TipList.EnterInfo: Use Enter to break the line.
TipList.CtrlEnterInfo: Enter Ctrl+Enter to open a conversation.
TipList.CtrlShiftEnterInfo: Enter Ctrl+Shift+Enter to open a conversation.
TipList.DoSepecificQuestion: Make your question in more detail to get a better response.

LoadingMsg.ContitnueWriting_input: Start adding content including your content...
LoadingMsg.Translate_input: Add your content to translate into {{language}}…
LoadingMsg.ChangeStyle_input: Change to ‘{{style}}’ tone with applying your content...
LoadingMsg.Grammar_input: Start correcting spelling/grammar with applying your content…

Txt2ImgTab.LoadingMsg: Polaris Office AI is creating an image based on your input. Please wait a moment.

ToastMsg.CompleteCreatingImage: Image creation completed. Select a job you want.
ToastMsg.CompleteInsertImage: Inserting image in document is completed.
ToastMsg.ForbiddenWord: The image description contains inappropriate words.
ToastMsg.GPTExceededLimit: An error occurred because the number of characters chatted exceeded the limit. Please try again.

ExampleList.Health: five effective ways to build healthy habits
ExampleList.DeliveryIdea: Brainstorm some ideas on how to market delivery service and tell me the pros of each idea.
ExampleList.Novel: Synopsis of novel of which topic is 'sea when it is rainy'
ExampleList.InterviewTopic: List of 10 questions for CEO of an online second hand clothes shopping site
ExampleList.RecommendGift: Suggest what would be good for my parent's birthday gift.
ExampleList.CreateDoc: How to create a document efficiently
ExampleList.AITech: Summarize what I should research for AI technology advancement.
ExampleList.Recipe: Recipe of a delicious aglio olio pasta
ExampleList.BusinessChart: Create table of contents for new business plan
ExampleList.CreateReport: How to write an email to report meeting results
ExampleList.Flight: a flying airplane,  a pencil drawing, HQ
ExampleList.Tiger: picture of a tiger enjoying sunbathing in the city, concept art, 4K
ExampleList.Panda: Panda on a beach drawn by Leonardo da Vinci
ExampleList.Puppy: a cute and lovely puppy, comics, fantasy, artStation style
ExampleList.Space: lion shape, galaxy, spiral, the universe, nebula, star, smoke, iridescent, elaborated detail, 8k
ExampleList.House: House, concept art, matte painting, HQ, 4k
ExampleList.NewYear: New year celebration festival at river, fireworks, drone show, surreal, 8k, high definition
ExampleList.ComicPoster: Harry Potter poster in a comic concept, 4K, HQ

ToastMsg.UsedAllCredit: You have used all your credits.
ToastMsg.NoCredit: Insufficient credits, {{credit}} credits needed to continue.
ToastMsg.TabLoadedAndWait: AI is creating a content in the {{tab}}. Please wait for a while to finish, or abort the process and try again.
ToastMsg.StartCreating: A content will be created. {{deductionCredit}} credits have been used. (remaining credits: {{leftCredit}})
ToastMsg.AIError: Failed to generate AI , please try again!
ToastMsg.StopMsg: Writing content aborted. Select a job you want.
ToastMsg.SuccessMsg: Writing content completed. Select a job you want.
ToastMsg.ErrorMsg: An error has occurred. Please try again later. ({{code}} : {{msg}})
ToastMsg.ServiceErrorMsg: Experiencing issues with the service. Please try again later.
ToastMsg.UnauthorizedMsg: You need to be logged in to use this feature. Please check your login status again.

Offline.CheckNetwork: Please check your network status while using

AskDoc.Greeting: Hello. This is a Polaris Office AI ASK Doc and I provide answers based on the document.

LoadingMsg.Info: Analyzing the document to find better answers! Please hold. It may take up to 3 minutes.

AskDoc.InitLoadQuestion: In the form of a list of two questions that people might be curious about, just ask them without answering them.
AskDoc.InitLoadInfoMention: Polaris Office AI has found the following questions.
AskDoc.InitLoadInfoContent: Polaris Office AI has found the following contents.
AskDoc.DefaultQuestion: What is most important in this document?
AskDoc.FailedConvert: The service could not be provided due to failure of document analysis. We’ll work tirelessly to provide better service.
AskDoc.FailedAnalyze: Document analysis failed. Please try again for a more accurate analysis.

Step1.MainText: There is an edit history in the document.
Step1.SubText: Would you like to reanalyze to incorporate the edited content?

Step2.MainText:
Reviewing the document.
 Please wait a moment.
Step2.SubText: checking the document on {{drive}}. Please wait a moment.

Step3.SubText3: Once a document has been analyzed, it can be used without additional credits.

Step4.MainText: Analyzing the document for a better response.
Step4.Noti:
Document analysis has been completed. 
 {{deductionCredit}} credits have been used. (remaining credits: {{leftCredit}})
Step4.Loading_Keyword: Searching for important questions within the document...
Step4.Loading_Done: Moving to the results screen shortly.

Modal.Over1000: For accurate document analysis, a minimum of 1,000 characters is required. Please provide additional content for the document.
Modal.Under300:
The document analysis is not possible as the document exceeds 300 pages.
Please reduce the number of pages in the document.
Modal.NeedCredit: Insufficient Credits. Requires a minimum of 5 credits for using ASK Doc.
Modal.FailedAnalyze: Document analysis failed. Please try again for a more accurate analysis.
Modal.DefaultError:
The service could not be provided due to failure of document analysis.
We’ll work tirelessly to provide better service.
Modal.SameNameInDrive: A file with the same name in Polaris Drive. Would you like to overwrite the current file?
Modal.LackUsage: Insufficient Polaris Drive capacity, preventing document analysis. Consider upgrading your plan for more storage space.
Modal.UploadFail:
The document upload has failed.
Please try again.

Alli.AlreadyExistNote: There are already existing slide notes on this page. Generating slide note consumes the credits.
Alli.insertNote: Insert the slide note in {{page}} page
Alli.AlreadyExistSlideContents: Previous edits are lost when the slide content is imported. Continue to proceed?

EOS.ASKDocEOSDesc: Meet the newly improved ASK Doc V2 after updating the app.
EOS.AIChatTab: The AI Write chat feature will be upgraded to a more advanced AI agent. As a result, the chat function will be discontinued. We appreciate your understanding. Thank you.

SearchGuide.Title: Ask the smart AI anything.
SearchGuide.SubTitle: Attach a document and quickly grasp the main contents through chat.
SearchGuide.Example1: Draft a personal statement for application approval.
SearchGuide.Example3: Growth prospects of the 2024 EV market.

UploadState.upload_image: To provide an answer, we are saving the file to Polaris Office Drive.
UploadState.upload_document: To provide an answer, we are processing the file on Polaris Office Drive.
UploadState.wait: I'm preparing an answer. Please wait for a moment!
UploadState.delay: It's almost finished. Please wait a little longer!

Msg.Home: To insert into the document, please open the document and enter edit mode first. Don't worry, your response won't disappear!
Msg.Viewer: To insert into the document, please enter edit mode. Don't worry, your response won't disappear!

Chat.FailOpenDoc: A document is currently open! Please close the document first, then select the desired document.

Alert.UnsupportFile: This file is not supported. Please upload only {{support}} files.

NoCredit.Title: All credits have been used :(
NoCredit.UpgradeLevel: Subscribe to a plan and increase your work efficiency with smart NOVA!

NoCredit.android: Purchase additional AI credits and enhance your productivity with the smart NOVA!

NotEnoughCredit.Title: Credits are insufficient :(

Alert.OverFileUploadSize: You can only select documents between {{min}}KB and {{max}}MB. Please try again.
Alert.ReQuestion: Oh no! The answer is delayed. Sorry, but could you ask the question again?
Alert.LackOfStorage: There is not enough storage space on the Polaris Drive. Please make sure you have enough storage space to upload files!
Alert.LowResolution: The image's resolution is low, making analysis difficult. Please upload a higher resolution image.
Alert.DamagedFile: The file is damaged and cannot be uploaded. Please check the file again.
Alert.FailedToInsertIntoDoc: Failed to insert into document. Please try again

Checking.Title: Function under maintenance
Checking.Msg: The function is under maintenance. Please try again later.

Alert.Error: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
Alert.ExpiredNOVA: The conversation with NOVA has expired. Starting a new conversation.
Alert.FailedConvertDoc: The selected document is encrypted and cannot be attached. Please decrypt it and try again.
Alert.UnopenableDocError: Encrypted or corrupted documents cannot be queried. Please check the document again.

NewChat.Title: Would you like to start a new conversation?
NewChat.Msg: When you select 'New Conversation', the contents of the conversation so far will be deleted.

PersonalInfo.Title: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information (Required)
PersonalInfo.Msg1: To provide the AI NOVA service, we need your consent for the collection and use of personal information as follows.
PersonalInfo.Msg3: You have the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information. However, if you refuse consent, you will not be able to use the service.
PersonalInfo.ChatRetention: 3 years from the date of collection.
PersonalInfo.FileRetention: Up to 1 day after the conversation expires.

Access.Msg: Would you like to allow Polaris Office to access photos, media, and files on your device?

GoToDocSearch.Msg: When you go to 'Document Search', your conversation with NOVA will end. Do you still want to move?

GoToOtherAiFeatures.Msg: If you use other AI features, the conversation with NOVA will end. Do you still want to move?
